text: Kakki Nakshatram is a 2002 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Vijay P Nair, starring Nishanth Sagar and Charmila in the lead role. ==Cast== * Sindhu * Rajan P Dev as Anamuttathu Ahammadu Haji * Vijay P Nair * Athira as Radhika * Charmila * Devan as Chirayambalam George Kutty * Jagadish as Balan * Jayan Cherthala * Mala Aravindan as Sreedharan/Radhika's father * Manju Krishna * Master Twinku * Master Vivek * Narendra Prasad as Home Minister Thomas Vattoly * Nishanth Sagar as Achuthan Kutty * Ramadevi * Renuka Thomas * Salim Kumar as Usman * Suresh Babu * TS Raju * Tharun Sagar * Saju Kodiyan as Basheer ==References== ==External links== * Category:2002 films Category:Indian films Category:2000s Malayalam-language films
title: Kakki Nakshatram
